summary: AI HEALTH ZON website - healthcare claim intelligence system information platform with licensing knowledge board
architectural_notes: Multi-page website structure with knowledge board and product information sections
Healthcare-focused content management for claim intelligence system features
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero banner image showing healthcare professionals reviewing digital claim data on screens with AI visualization overlays (claim-intelligence-hero.dim_1200x600.png)
- Icon illustration representing validation checkmarks and shield symbol for security and compliance (validation-security-icon.dim_256x256.png)
- Diagram showing 10 interconnected layers of the validation system in a circular or flow pattern (validation-layers-diagram.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a new frontend page route '/clean-claim-intelligence' that displays comprehensive information about the AI HEALTH ZON Clean Claim Intelligence System product, including hero section with headline 'AI HEALTH ZON â€“ AI-Driven Clean Claim Intelligence System' and subheadline 'Maximize Approvals. Eliminate Rejections. Prevent Claim Losses.'

Add 'Why Hospitals Lose Revenue' section listing six key revenue loss factors: preventable claim rejections, billing & coding errors, policy & package mismatches, delayed settlements & cash flow gaps, documentation deficiencies, and undetected fraud & abuse patterns

Add 'Our Solution' section explaining that AI HEALTH ZON Clean Claim Intelligence System is a multi-layer validation & decision engine that transforms claim processing from manual verification to AI-driven intelligence, with emphasis on prediction, prevention, and correction of risks across the entire claim lifecycle

Create 'Core Validation & Intelligence Layers' section with expandable accordion or card layout displaying all 10 validation layers: (1) Patient Identity & Eligibility Intelligence with 5 features, (2) Pre-Authorization & Policy Logic Engine with 5 features, (3) Clinical Validity & Medical Necessity Engine with 5 features, (4) Medical Coding & Classification Integrity with 5 features, (5) Treatment & Billing Consistency Controls with 5 features, (6) Documentation & Record Integrity Validation with 5 features, (7) Claim Lifecycle & Aging Intelligence with 5 features, (8) Advanced Fraud & Abuse Analytics with 5 features, (9) Financial Accuracy & Leakage Prevention with 5 features, (10) Compliance & Regulatory Safeguards with 5 features

Add 'What Makes AI HEALTH ZON Different' section highlighting five differentiators with checkmarks: Rejection Prevention Intelligence, Clinical + Financial + Policy-Aware Validation, Predictive Denial & Risk Models, AI-Driven Fraud Detection, and Audit & Compliance Protection, with closing statement 'We move beyond error detection toward decision intelligence'

Add 'Business Impact for Hospitals' section listing six benefits with bullet points: higher claim approval rates, reduced rejection & resubmission cycles, faster settlements & improved cash flow, lower audit exposure, controlled billing leakage, and stronger compliance posture
Add 'Who Benefits' section with checkmarks listing five stakeholder types: Hospitals & Medical Colleges, Multi-hospital Chains, TPAs & Insurers, Government Health Schemes, and Claim Processing Units

Add call-to-action section with heading 'Transform Claim Processing into a Revenue Protection System' and subheading 'Stop losing revenue to preventable errors and hidden risks. Deploy an AI-driven Clean Claim Intelligence System built for modern healthcare finance.'

Add 'Get in Touch' contact section displaying AI HEALTH ZON branding with website URL www.aihealthzon.com, email info@aihealthzon.com, and phone number 8233393456, maintaining consistency with existing contact information on other pages
Add navigation link to the Clean Claim Intelligence page in the main navigation menu under Solutions or as a separate menu item, ensuring it is accessible from all pages

new_feature_requests.summary: Add comprehensive AI HEALTH ZON product information page with 10 validation layers
